section.section: Each cooperative shall have an audit committee as specified in its bylaws.

At least annually, the audit committee shall audit, or cause to have audited, the affairs of the cooperative and make a full report on the audit to the board of directors, the meeting of delegates, and the annual membership meeting.
A report for the previous fiscal year shall be read or presented in written form at the annual meeting of members of the cooperative and kept with the records of the cooperative.

text.section: A copy of this annual report shall be kept on file at the principal office of the cooperative and be made available to the members during regular business hours.
